hackathon-description-text: Welcome to Hack the Burgh—the hackathon beyond the wall— we're back for the fourth time!
hackathon-eligibility:
Hack the Burgh is open exclusively to those who are participating in this hackathon in Edinburgh.
All hackers should have a ticket on our website and should have checked in at arrival.
To be eligible to win challenges you must have a team size less than or equal to 4.
hackathon-rules: You can read our code of conduct here:

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: We choose the top three hacks of the weekend.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Informatics Forum, 10 Crichton St, Edinburgh EH8 9AB, UK
hackathon-location-address: Informatics Forum, 10 Crichton St, Edinburgh EH8 9AB, UK
hackathon-description-header: The hackathon from beyond the wall.
